engine

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all game logic, including updating player and enemy positions, determining how to handle events depending on the current GameState, scrolling the background, and handling collisions.
    Version:
    - 1.0
    Author:
    - Joshua Colicchio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameLogic()
      This method sets the initial values for the GameLogic loop, and then starts the loop.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLogic

        public GameLogic()
        This method sets the initial values for the GameLogic loop, and then starts the loop.

    • Method Detail

      • pauseGame

        public void pauseGame()
        This method is called when the game state is changed to PAUSED. It tells each instance of Enemy2 what time the game was paused at so that the path function can offset itself by the pause time so the path of motion doesn't jerk suddenly.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        This method clears all game objects from the screen (Enemies, Pickups, etc.). Called when game state is set to GAMEOVER.

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Prepares the game to start, sets the game state to RUNNING, then starts the game logic loop.

      • stopAnimationTimer

        public void stopAnimationTimer()
        Stops the game logic loop.

      • startAnimationTimer

        public void startAnimationTimer()
        Starts the game logic loop.

      • chooseNextBackground

        public void chooseNextBackground()
        This method randomly chooses a new background image to display.

      • indexOfBG

        public Background indexOfBG(int index)
        This method returns the requested background using the provided index.
        Parameters:
        index - - Index to get result from [0-3]
        Returns:
        engine.classes.Background

      • updateBackground

        public void updateBackground()
        This method updates the position of the background, and the next upcoming background. Once the top of the current background reaches the top of the screen, the next background is attached to the top of the screen, and begins to update. When the lower background leaves the screen, it is sent to storage.

      • updateEnemies

        public void updateEnemies(long now)
        Updates position of all on screen enemies, and cleans them up if they are marked for removal.
        Parameters:
        now - - The current time in nanoseconds.

      • findEnemy

        public EnemyShip findEnemy(EnemyShip es)
        Searches through all on screen enemies until it finds the requested enemy.
        Parameters:
        es - - The enemy to find.
        Returns:
        ships.baseclasses.EnemyShip

      • updatePickups

        public void updatePickups(long now)
        Updates the position of all on screen pickups, and removes any pickups that have gone off screen. Also handles collision detection with the player.
        Parameters:
        now - - The current time in nanoseconds.

      • spawnPickup

        public void spawnPickup(double xCoord,
                        double yCoord)
        Spawns a pickup with a random effect at the provided X and Y coordinates. Primarily used to spawn pickups on destroyed enemies.
        Parameters:
        xCoord - - X Coordinate to spawn the pickup at.
        yCoord - - Y Coordinate to spawn the pickup at.

      • spawnPickup

        public void spawnPickup()
        Spawns a pickup with a random effect at the top of the screen.

      • updateBullets

        public void updateBullets()
        Updates the position of all on screen bullets, and handles collision detection.

      • registerBullet

        public void registerBullet(Bullet bullet)
        Adds the bullet to the ArrayList of all on screen bullets, and adds it to the root pane.
        Parameters:
        bullet - - Bullet to add.

      • playerFiring

        public void playerFiring(boolean isFiring)
        Updates whether or not the player is currently firing.
        Parameters:
        isFiring - - Whether the player is firing or not.

      • onEnemyDestroyed

        public boolean onEnemyDestroyed(int score)
        Updates the players' score.
        Parameters:
        score - - The value to increment the players' score by.
        Returns:
        boolean
